```{r S3 function save_result  & process input data}
# Define function to read and preprocess data
#ag.production.by.tech_SSP585_gfdl_climate_vars_combines

read_and_preprocess <- function(filename, csv_save_path) {
  read.csv(paste0(csv_save_path, filename,scenario_set,"_gfdl_climate_vars_combines.csv")) %>%
    dplyr::select(-X)
}

# Define function to aggregate data by land type
aggregate_land_type <- function(data, land_types, new_landleaf) {
  filtered_df <- data %>% filter(landleaf %in% land_types)
  
  summed_df <- filtered_df %>%
    group_by(Units, scenario, region, year) %>%
    summarize(across(ori:gfdl_ssp585ndep_updateall, sum)) %>%
    ungroup() %>%
    mutate(landleaf = new_landleaf) %>%
    select(Units, scenario, region, year, landleaf, everything())
  
  result_df <- data %>%
    filter(!landleaf %in% land_types) %>%
    bind_rows(summed_df) %>%
    arrange(Units, scenario, region, landleaf, year)
  
  return(result_df)
}

# Define function to rename landleaf types
rename_landleaf <- function(data) {
  data %>%
    mutate(landleaf = gsub("pasture \\(other\\)", "Unmanaged pasture", landleaf)) %>%
    mutate(landleaf = gsub("pasture \\(grazed\\)", "Managed pasture", landleaf)) %>%
    mutate(landleaf = gsub("grass", "Grass", landleaf)) %>%
    mutate(landleaf = gsub("shrub", "Shrub", landleaf)) %>%
    mutate(landleaf = gsub("biomass", "Bioenergy", landleaf))
}
```

```{r S5_2 function fig plotting & saving }
#########################################
save_plot_in_formats <- function(plot, path, base_filename, case_name, width, height) {
  # Define the formats and their specific settings
  formats <- list(
    svg = list(ext = "svg", device = "svg", dpi = NULL),
    pdf = list(ext = "pdf", device = "pdf", dpi = NULL),
    png = list(ext = "png", device = "png", dpi = 300),
    tif = list(ext = "tif", device = "tiff", dpi = 300)
  )
  # Loop through each format and save the plot
  for (format in names(formats)) {
    file_path <- paste0(path, base_filename, case_name, ".", formats[[format]]$ext)
    # Check if dpi is needed
    if (is.null(formats[[format]]$dpi)) {
      ggsave(
        file_path,
        plot = plot,
        width = width,
        height = height,
        device = formats[[format]]$device
      )
    } else {
      ggsave(
        file_path,
        plot = plot,
        width = width,
        height = height,
        dpi = formats[[format]]$dpi,
        device = formats[[format]]$device
      )
    }
  }
}
```

```{r S6 aggregated.land.allocation process 2 for plotting  SSP370 & SSP126 & SSP585}
  plot_var_name<-"aggregated.land.allocation"


process_land_allocation <- function(data) {
  
  
  # data<-aggregated.land.allocation_combines_gfdl_s6
  
  long_aggregated_land_allocation <- data %>%
    group_by(Units, scenario, landleaf, year) %>%
    summarise(across(ori:gfdl_ssp585ndep_updateall, sum, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
    ungroup() %>%
    # pivot_longer(cols = ori:gfdl_ssp585ndep_updateall, 
    #              names_to = "case", 
    #              values_to = "value") %>%
    distinct()
  
  
  long_aggregated_land_allocation_climate_var_diff <- data %>%
    group_by(Units, scenario, landleaf, year) %>%
    summarise(across(ori:gfdl_ssp585ndep_updateall, sum, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
    ungroup() %>%
    mutate(gfdl_updateall_co2_for = (gfdl_default_updateall-gfdl_2015co2_updateall) - (gfdl_default_updateall_orifor-gfdl_2015co2_updateall_orifor),
    gfdl_updateall_ndep_for = (gfdl_ssp585ndep_updateall-gfdl_default_updateall) - (gfdl_ssp585ndep_updateall_orifor-gfdl_default_updateall_orifor),
    gfdl_updateall_precip_temp_for = (gfdl_2015co2_updateall - ori)-(gfdl_2015co2_updateall_orifor - ori)) %>%
    dplyr::select(-c(5:11)) %>%
    # pivot_longer(cols = classic_gfdl_default_updateall_ori:classic_gfdl_default_updateall_orifor_ori, 
    #              names_to = "case", 
    #              values_to = "value") %>%
    distinct()
  
  # write.csv(long_aggregated_land_allocation_climate_var_diff,paste0(csv_save_path,"long_aggregated_land_allocation_climate_var_diff_",scenario_set,"_3.csv"))
  
  
  
  long_aggregated_land_allocation_climate_var_diff_re <- data %>%
    group_by(Units, scenario, landleaf, year) %>%
    summarise(across(ori:gfdl_ssp585ndep_updateall, sum, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
    ungroup() %>%
    mutate(
      gfdl_updateall_co2_for = if_else((gfdl_default_updateall_orifor-gfdl_2015co2_updateall_orifor) == 0, 0, (((gfdl_default_updateall-gfdl_2015co2_updateall) / (gfdl_default_updateall_orifor-gfdl_2015co2_updateall_orifor)) - 1)*100),
    gfdl_updateall_ndep_for = if_else((gfdl_ssp585ndep_updateall_orifor-gfdl_default_updateall_orifor) == 0, 0, (((gfdl_ssp585ndep_updateall-gfdl_default_updateall) / (gfdl_ssp585ndep_updateall_orifor-gfdl_default_updateall_orifor)) - 1)*100),
    gfdl_updateall_precip_temp_for = if_else((gfdl_2015co2_updateall_orifor - ori) == 0, 0, (((gfdl_2015co2_updateall - ori) / (gfdl_2015co2_updateall_orifor - ori)) - 1) *100)
    ) %>%
    dplyr::select(-c(5:11)) %>%
    # pivot_longer(cols = classic_gfdl_default_updateall_ori:classic_gfdl_default_updateall_orifor_ori, 
    #              names_to = "case", 
    #              values_to = "value") %>%
    distinct() 
  
  
  
  return(list(
    long_aggregated_land_allocation = long_aggregated_land_allocation,
    long_aggregated_land_allocation_climate_var_diff = long_aggregated_land_allocation_climate_var_diff,
    long_aggregated_land_allocation_climate_var_diff_re = long_aggregated_land_allocation_climate_var_diff_re
    
  ))
}
```

```{r function, all LU type time series in one fig}
# Define a function to create plots, specifying all details via parameters
create_ssp_plot <- function(data, y_column, y_limits=NULL, title, x_label , y_label = "",a_label,h_just=11.5, show_legend = TRUE, plot_margins = margin(1, 0.4, 0, 0, "cm"),if_ylab=FALSE,line_size = 1.5,ysize=0) {
  
  y_label2 <- if (if_ylab) {
    bquote(atop(.(y_label), "difference ("~"thousand km "^2~")","   ","  "))
    
  } else {
    ""
    
  }
  #
  
  p <- ggplot(data = data, aes(x = year, y = !!sym(y_column),color = factor(landleaf, levels = landleaf_order))) +
    geom_line(size = line_size) +
    # geom_point(size = point_size) + # Adding points for better visibility
    scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(from = 2020, to = 2100, by = 20), expand = c(0.01, 0.01)) +
    scale_y_continuous(limits = y_limits) +
    scale_color_manual(values = landleaf_colors) + # Assigning colors
    labs(y = y_label2, x = x_label, title = title) +
    theme_base() +
    theme(panel.grid = element_blank(), panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white", colour = NA),
          plot.background = element_rect(fill = "white", colour = NA),
          plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, size = 17),
          axis.title.x = element_text(size = 17), axis.title.y = element_text(size = 17),
          legend.position = ifelse(show_legend, "right", "none"),
          # legend.direction = "horizontal", 
          legend.text = element_text(size = 15),
          axis.text.x = element_text(size = 13,color = "black"), 
          legend.title = element_text(size = 17),
          plot.margin = plot_margins,
    axis.text.y = element_text(size = ysize,color = "black")) +
    guides(color = guide_legend(title = "Land use types"))+ 
  annotate(
    "text",
    x = Inf,
    y = Inf,
    label = a_label,
   hjust = h_just,
    vjust = 1.5,
    size = 6
  )  
  
   
  if (!if_ylab) {
  p <- p +
    theme(axis.title.y = element_blank(),
          axis.text.y = element_blank(),
          axis.ticks.y = element_blank()
          )
 }
  
  return(p)
}

          axis.text.x = element_text(size = 13,color = "black"), 
          legend.title = element_text(size = 17),
          plot.margin = plot_margins,
    axis.text.y = element_text(size = ysize,color = "black")) +
    guides(color = guide_legend(title = "Land use types"))+ 
  annotate(
    "text",
    x = Inf,
    y = Inf,
    label = a_label,
   hjust = h_just,
    vjust = 1.5,
    size = 6
  )  
  
   
  if (!if_ylab) {
  p <- p +
    theme(axis.title.y = element_blank(),
          axis.text.y = element_blank(),
          axis.ticks.y = element_blank()
          )
 }
  
  return(p)
}
```
